metadata.Title: CVE-2013-4473 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description:
Stack-based buffer overflow in the extractPages function in utils/pdfseparate.cc in poppler before 0.24.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code via a source filename.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4473` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.24.3-0ubuntu1
libpoppler-cpp0 - 0.24.3-0ubuntu1
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.24.3-0ubuntu1
libpoppler-qt4-4 - 0.24.3-0ubuntu1
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.24.3-0ubuntu1
libpoppler58 - 0.24.3-0ubuntu1
poppler-utils - 0.24.3-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: poppler package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.24.3-0ubuntu1').
